==Trivia==
* Steady Posture is the only [[Stance Passives|Stance Passive]] that has the "Posture" name in it, due to {{St|Steady Stance 2}} (and {{St|Steady Breath}}) being released first and therefore having the "Steady" modifier of name, unlike {{St|Steady Blow}}'s relationship with {{St|Armored Blow}}.
